<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/70790</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>70790</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120639</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120639</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120639</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Zanka v spreminjajočem se magnetnem polju</string>
            <string language="en">Loop in a Changing Magnetic Field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schleife in einem Ändern magnetisch 
Fangen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Boucle dans un champ magnétique changeant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Laço em um campo magnético em mudança</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclo in un campo magnetico cambiante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρόχος σε ένα μεταβαλλόμενο μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bucle en un campo magnético que cambia</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V žični zanki v zunanjem magnetnem polju se lahko inducira napetost in posledično inducira tok, če se magnetno polje s časom spreminja.</string>
            <string language="en">Wire loop placed inside the magnetic field - induction of voltage and current when changes of magnetic field appear.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetni pretok</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">faradayev zakon</string>
            <string language="en">faraday's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Leitungsschlaufe, die innerhalb des 
magnetischen plaziert wird, fangen auf - Induktion der 
Spannung und Strom, wenn Änderungen von magnetischem 
auffangen, erscheinen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Boucle placée à l'intérieur du champ 
magnétique - induction de tension et courant quand les changements du
champ magnétique apparaissent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aro de arame colocado dentro do campo magnético 
- indução da tensão e corrente quando as mudanças do campo 
magnético aparecerem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclo di legare disposto all'interno del campo 
magnetico - induzione di tensione e corrente quando i cambiamenti del 
campo magnetico compaiono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρόχος καλωδίων που τοποθετείται μέσα στο μαγνητικό 
πεδίο - επαγωγή της τάσης και του ρεύματος όταν εμφανίζονται οι 
αλλαγές του μαγνητικού πεδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Anillo puesto dentro del campo magnético - 
inducción del voltaje y corriente cuando aparecen los cambios del 
campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetischer Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz Faraday</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">flux magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi de faraday</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fluxo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei de Faraday</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento continuo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge del faraday</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητική ροή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος του Faraday</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">flux magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley de faraday</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
